price: 18 Oui, qui pourrait t’indiquer ce qu’est vraiment le Jour du jugement dernier ?
arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: thumma mā adrāka mā yawmu al-dīni
